openings.title: React Native Mobile App Developer
openings.description: Join our mobile team to build and enhance our cross-platform fitness application using React Native. This is a great opportunity for aspiring developers to gain hands-on experience in a real-world product that impacts thousands of users.
exReq: Proficiency in JavaScript, ES6+, and modern front-end principles.
Familiarity with React and React Native.
Understanding of mobile app development lifecycle.
Basic knowledge of RESTful APIs and state management libraries (like Redux or MobX).
A portfolio of personal projects or coursework demonstrating your skills.
Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Eagerness to learn and a passion for building great mobile experiences.

openings.title: Digital Marketing Associate
openings.description: Help us grow our user base and engage our community through creative and data-driven digital marketing campaigns. This role is perfect for students passionate about marketing, social media, and the fitness industry.
exReq: Strong understanding of social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, Facebook).
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Familiarity with content creation, SEO principles, and email marketing is a plus.
Ability to analyze data and generate insights.
Creative mindset with a can-do attitude.
Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
A passion for fitness and building online communities.

openings.title: UI/UX Design Intern
openings.description: Create intuitive and beautiful user experiences for our web and mobile applications. This internship is a fantastic opportunity to work on a real product, from wireframing and prototyping to high-fidelity design, shaping the look and feel of our fitness platform.
exReq: A portfolio showcasing your design process and UI/UX projects (coursework, personal projects, etc.).
Familiarity with design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
Basic understanding of user-centered design principles, wireframing, and prototyping.
Strong visual design skills with an eye for typography, color, and layout.
Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Design, HCI, or a related field.
Excellent communication skills and a willingness to learn and collaborate.
A passion for creating user-friendly and engaging digital experiences.
